message: Suddenly, my Coil rings.
Mr. Haga?!
But communication between Platinum Jail and the Old Residential District is blocked...
I force my way out of the crowd and pick up once I've got some distance.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Mr. Haga!"

name: 羽賀
message: "...Aoba? I'm disguising this call as direct from the mainland. We should be able to talk briefly."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you alright? I just saw some footage of the Old Residential District..."

name: 羽賀
message: "Yes. Loud music started playing everywhere. And then everyone became fixated on the broadcast from Platinum Jail."

name: 蒼葉
message: "How's everyone else? Like Granny and Koujaku, and Ms. Yoshie. Are they okay?"

name: 羽賀
message: "They're fine for the moment. Ms. Tae told everyone to cover their ears just before it started."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thank goodness..."

name: 羽賀
message: "Are you okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm alright."

name: 羽賀
message: "Good. But take care of yourself. Remember, you're not alone. We're working on a countermeasure. We'll manage somehow."

name: 羽賀
message: "I don't believe he's going to try anything else today. It seems he plans to make his real move tomorrow at the main event."

name: 羽賀
message: "We have some time to prepare. So please stay calm on your end, too. Panicking won't do anyone any good."

name: 羽賀
message: "Ms. Tae would be devastated if anything happened to you. I would be too, of course. So please―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mr. Haga? Mr. Haga!"
No response. I immediately try to redial.
But it won't connect! Shit!
Just as I'm about to try again, another roar goes up from the crowd.

name: 東江
message: "We stand on the eve of a great day. Please, enjoy the festivities. I'll see you all... tomorrow."
With a parting smile, Toue vanishes into the tower with Sei and his entourage of guards.
For a while, the crowd keeps clapping like they're hoping for an encore, but finally people start to split off.
I stand there, dazed, as the throngs move past.
Too much is happening. My head feels like it's going to burst.
What am I supposed to do?

name: 蓮
message: "We should go back to Glitter and rest."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We don't have time for that!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry. You're right."
I need to get my thoughts in order...
Swallowing my panic, I slowly make my way out of the crowd.
My feet feel heavy... like they're sticking to the pavement.
At the same time, I can't shake the sense that this is all a dream...
